title: Toshishita Kareshi no Renai Kanriheki
original_name: 年下彼氏の恋愛管理癖
sinopse:
Volume 1
1-3. Toshishita Kareshi no Renai Kanriheki (Young Boyfriend's Love Management Habit) 4. Ote wo Douzo, Ouji-sama♥ (Please Take My Hand, My Prince♥) 5. Kimi ni Sasagu Sadistic (A Sadist Devoted to You) 6. ○-tsuki ×-hi, Karera no Chikan Jijou ni Tsuite. (Their Perverted Circumstances.)

Volume 2
1-2. Toshishita Kareshi no Renai Kanriheki 4-5 3. Ote wo Douzo, Ouji-sama♥ 3
4-5. Kimi ni Sasagu Sadistic 2-3 6. ○-tsuki ×-hi, Karera no Natsuyasumi Jijou ni Tsuite.
